properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AddonArcProperties.description: The properties of an Arc addon

offer.description: The HCX offer, example VMware MaaS Cloud Provider (Enterprise)

provisioningState.description: The state of the addon provisioning

AddonSrmProperties.description: The properties of a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon

AddonVrProperties.description: The properties of a vSphere Replication (VR) addon

AdminCredentials.description: Administrative credentials for accessing vCenter and NSX-T

AvailabilityProperties.description: The properties describing private cloud availability zone distribution

strategy.description: The availability strategy for the private cloud

zone.description: The primary availability zone for the private cloud

secondaryZone.description: The secondary availability zone for the private cloud

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

status.description: The operational status of the datastore

targetId.description: Azure resource ID of the iSCSI target

lunName.description: Name of the LUN to be used for datastore

mountOption.description:
Mode that describes whether the LUN has to be mounted as a datastore or

autoDetectedKeyVersion.description: The auto-detected version of the key if versionType is auto-detected.

versionType.description: Property of the key if user provided or auto detected

PlacementPolicy.description: A vSphere Distributed Resource Scheduler (DRS) placement policy

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

state.description: Whether the placement policy is enabled or disabled

displayName.description: Display name of the placement policy

PlacementPolicyUpdate.description: An update of a DRS placement policy resource

properties.description: The properties of a placement policy resource that may be updated

PlacementPolicyUpdateProperties.description: The properties of a placement policy resource that may be updated

state.description: Whether the placement policy is enabled or disabled

azureHybridBenefitType.description: placement policy azure hybrid benefit opt-in type

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identity.description: The identity of the private cloud, if configured.

principalId.description:
The principal ID of private cloud identity. This property will only be provided
for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description:
The tenant ID associated with the private cloud. This property will only be
provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description:
The type of identity used for the private cloud. The type 'SystemAssigned'
refers to an implicitly created identity. The type 'None' will remove any
identities from the Private Cloud.

PrivateCloudProperties.description: The properties of a private cloud resource

managementCluster.description: The default cluster used for management

internet.description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled

identitySources.description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

availability.description: Properties describing how the cloud is distributed across availability zones

encryption.description: Customer managed key encryption, can be enabled or disabled

extendedNetworkBlocks.description:
Array of additional networks noncontiguous with networkBlock. Networks must be
unique and non-overlapping across VNet in your subscription, on-premise, and
this privateCloud networkBlock attribute. Make sure the CIDR format conforms to
(A.B.C.D/X).

networkBlock.description:
The block of addresses should be unique across VNet in your subscription as
well as on-premise. Make sure the CIDR format is conformed to (A.B.C.D/X) where
A,B,C,D are between 0 and 255, and X is between 0 and 22

managementNetwork.description: Network used to access vCenter Server and NSX-T Manager

provisioningNetwork.description: Used for virtual machine cold migration, cloning, and snapshot migration

vmotionNetwork.description: Used for live migration of virtual machines

vcenterPassword.description: Optionally, set the vCenter admin password when the private cloud is created

nsxtPassword.description: Optionally, set the NSX-T Manager password when the private cloud is created

vcenterCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the vCenter Server SSL certificate

nsxtCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the NSX-T Manager SSL certificate

externalCloudLinks.description: Array of cloud link IDs from other clouds that connect to this one

secondaryCircuit.description:
A secondary expressRoute circuit from a separate AZ. Only present in a
stretched private cloud

nsxPublicIpQuotaRaised.description:
Flag to indicate whether the private cloud has the quota for provisioned NSX
Public IP count raised from 64 to 1024

PrivateCloudUpdate.description: An update to a private cloud resource

properties.description: The updatable properties of a private cloud resource

identity.description: The identity of the private cloud, if configured.

PrivateCloudUpdateProperties.description: The properties of a private cloud resource that may be updated

managementCluster.description: The default cluster used for management

internet.description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled

identitySources.description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

availability.description: Properties describing how the cloud is distributed across availability zones

encryption.description: Customer managed key encryption, can be enabled or disabled

extendedNetworkBlocks.description:
Array of additional networks noncontiguous with networkBlock. Networks must be
unique and non-overlapping across VNet in your subscription, on-premise, and
this privateCloud networkBlock attribute. Make sure the CIDR format conforms to
(A.B.C.D/X).

hostsRemaining.description: Remaining hosts quota by sku type

quotaEnabled.description: Host quota is active for current subscription

ScriptCmdlet.description: A cmdlet available for script execution

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ScriptExecution.description: An instance of a script executed by a user - custom or AVS

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ScriptExecutionParameter.description: The arguments passed in to the execution

scriptCmdletId.description: A reference to the script cmdlet resource if user is running a AVS script

hiddenParameters.description:
Parameters that will be hidden/not visible to ARM, such as passwords and
credentials

failureReason.description:
Error message if the script was able to run, but if the script itself had
errors or powershell threw an exception

retention.description: Time to live for the resource. If not provided, will be available for 60 days

submittedAt.description: Time the script execution was submitted

startedAt.description: Time the script execution was started

finishedAt.description: Time the script execution was finished

provisioningState.description: The state of the script execution resource

output.description: Standard output stream from the powershell execution

information.description: Standard information out stream from the powershell execution

warnings.description: Standard warning out stream from the powershell execution

AddonNameParameter.name: addonName
AddonNameParameter.description: Name of the addon for the private cloud.

AuthorizationNameParameter.name: authorizationName
AuthorizationNameParameter.description: Name of the ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization in the private cloud.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

CloudLinkNameParameter.name: cloudLinkName
CloudLinkNameParameter.description: Name of the cloud link resource.

ClusterNameParameter.name: clusterName
ClusterNameParameter.description: Name of the cluster in the private cloud.

DatastoreNameParameter.name: datastoreName
DatastoreNameParameter.description: Name of the datastore in the private cloud cluster.

DhcpIdParameter.name: dhcpId
DhcpIdParameter.description: NSX DHCP identifier. Generally the same as the DHCP display name.

DnsServiceIdParameter.name: dnsServiceId
DnsServiceIdParameter.description: NSX DNS Service identifier. Generally the same as the DNS Service's display name.

DnsZoneIdParameter.name: dnsZoneId
DnsZoneIdParameter.description: NSX DNS Zone identifier. Generally the same as the DNS Zone's display name.

GatewayIdParameter.name: gatewayId
GatewayIdParameter.description: NSX Gateway identifier. Generally the same as the Gateway's display name.

GlobalReachConnectionNameParameter.name: globalReachConnectionName
GlobalReachConnectionNameParameter.description: Name of the global reach connection in the private cloud.

HcxEnterpriseSiteNameParameter.name: hcxEnterpriseSiteName
HcxEnterpriseSiteNameParameter.description: Name of the HCX Enterprise Site in the private cloud.

PlacementPolicyNameParameter.name: placementPolicyName
PlacementPolicyNameParameter.description: Name of the VMware vSphere Distributed Resource Scheduler (DRS) placement policy.

PortMirroringIdParameter.name: portMirroringId
PortMirroringIdParameter.description: NSX Port Mirroring identifier. Generally the same as the Port Mirroring display name.

PublicIpIdParameter.name: publicIPId
PublicIpIdParameter.description: NSX Public IP Block identifier. Generally the same as the Public IP Block's display name.

ScriptCmdletNameParameter.name: scriptCmdletName
ScriptCmdletNameParameter.description: Name of the script cmdlet resource in the script package in the private cloud.

ScriptExecutionNameParameter.name: scriptExecutionName
ScriptExecutionNameParameter.description: Name of the user-invoked script execution resource.

ScriptPackageNameParameter.name: scriptPackageName
ScriptPackageNameParameter.description: Name of the script package in the private cloud.

SegmentIdParameter.name: segmentId
SegmentIdParameter.description: NSX Segment identifier. Generally the same as the Segment's display name.

VmGroupIdParameter.name: vmGroupId
VmGroupIdParameter.description: NSX VM Group identifier. Generally the same as the VM Group's display name.

WorkloadNetworkNameParameter.description: Name of the script cmdlet resource in the script package in the private cloud.
